item.title: 5 New Toronto Restaurants Not to Miss
item.description: Need a break or want to socialize over food during the Toronto International Film Festival? Here are some tips.

item.title: Dan Tana, Former Owner of Namesake Hollywood Restaurant, Dies at 90
item.description: The sometime actor and former Yugoslavian soccer player sold the eatery, which last year celebrated its 60th anniversary, to current owner Sonja Perencevic in 2009 before moving to Belgrade, Serbia.

item.title: Dan Tana, Former Owner of Namesake Hollywood Restaurant, Dies at 90
item.description: The sometime actor and former Yugoslavian soccer player sold the eatery, which last year celebrated its 60th anniversary, to current owner Sonja Perencevic in 2009 before moving to Belgrade, Serbia.

item.title: Hollywood Sommeliers Pick the Best Rosés (and Whites) for the End of Summer
item.description: Don’t let the frivolous hue fool you: the town’s top somms take rosé very seriously these days. Their recommendations will elevate your end-of-summer parties — and keep your glass half-full well after

item.title: Elon Musk’s Nostalgic New Tesla Diner in Hollywood Will Please Tourists, His Cultists and Trend Chasers
item.description: The throwback drive-in, conceived years ago when the world’s richest man was still a Los Angeles hometown hero, bows in a radically different era.
